About Paesli:

We are a startup based in the San Francisco Bay Area that matches people for paid work such as meal prep and cooking, organizing and light cleaning, pet care, and more.

Right now weâ€™re handcrafting matches: connecting clients with talented, vetted providers for custom support.

How It Works

1. Tell us what you need

2. We'll help you select a provider from our list of great folks

3. Connect with your provider to agree on tasks, schedule and pay

You'll have a built-in backup, a to-do list superhero, and custom support to make your life easier.
